item.title: When do you fix bugs?
item.description: At work we have a decently sized pile of bugs in our backlog. Most of them are not business impacting or critical, so they just sit there. Unfortunately we’ve never had a process to handle bugs consistently - until now! This may seem obvious to some, and others will probably have an even better system - I’d love to hear from you if that’s the case! Our new process There are two parts to it:
